name: Pimiko Plus
description: It's time for Ruho to show 'em how a plumpy mama gets rich! Trade goods ranging from computers to automatic weapons as you visit the towns dotting a countryside in the sunset world of Tumydorado.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or above Processor: AMD Athlon X2 or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GPU with OpenGL 2.1 Storage: 35 MB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: Minimum 1280x720 resolution
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: AMD FX/Intel Sandy Bridge or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6500 Series or better Storage: 35 MB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: Minimum 1280x720 resolution
